name: Your first TWINE
description:
I wanted to make a TWINE game, and because I tend to draw inspiration from what is exactly in front of me (and no further), I made a game about the experience of making the game. That is to say; In this game, about me making this game, you will make this game, which is about you making this game, which I made for you.

It's short, simple, and subtle. And, yes, meta. And you may even learn some actual things about actually getting started with TWINE, so that's nice.
